Title: Baja Blast
Description:
This purely cosmetic mod "adds" baja blast to the game. (It was already in the game under the name of convalessence.)

Thanks to egocarib for describing the method of modding liquids.

Thanks to the Caves of Qud Discord in general for the recurring meme.

Find source and follow development at: https://bitbucket.org/HeladoDeBrownie/caves-of-qud-baja-blast/
